name: Green Dragonling
effect: On a critical hit, before dealing damage this weapon inflicts the Shredded condition until the end of the target’s next turn.
description: The Green Dragonling drone system launches a series of small hunter-killer drones armed with extremely powerful acid launchers, designed to melt through enemy armor and slag the structure beneath.

name: Platinum Dragonling
effect: Allied actors within the burst are not targeted by this attack. You may take any amount of additional self-heat when attacking with this weapon to increase the Burst size by 1 per additional heat taken.
description: One of a pair, the Platinum Dragonling is the heart and soul of Bahamut Industry’s drone designs; a mythical being of pure light, it seeks evil and banishes the darkness.

name: Flame Launcer
description: The Flame Launcher is a simple weapon; based on the principles of napalm, it fires a blob of molten matter that, while not as long-lasting as other plasma napalm systems, burns clean through both enemy units and cover. The exact chemical properties of the ammo is a closely-guarded secret; attempts to reverse-engineer it inevitably set labs on fire.

name: Plasma Breath
effect: You may only fire this weapon while in the Danger Zone.
description: Utilizing advanced reactor venting systems, Plasma Breath channels the fury of a coldcore reactor directly through a filter of plasma napalm, resulting in a small explosion of violent, holy energy followed by an intense wave of such fires, guaranteed to purge the unclean.

name: ‘Plinker’ Pistol
effect: Targets hit by this weapon suffer from the Lock On condition. This weapon may not benefit from bonus damage.
description: The ‘Plinker’ fires a small, almost laughably weak munition composed primarily of frangible metal around a nanomachine-based core--the payload that is the true threat this weapon projects.

name: Igdeus Drill
effect: Until the start of your next turn, whenever you take damage, you may as a reaction gain resistance to that damage and cause the target of this weapon to take an amount of AP energy damage equal to the amount of damage you took after resistance.
description: The Igdeus Drill uses a combination of the DRAGONFLY’s nanomachine and quantum technologies, in effect linking the user of the ‘weapon’ with the target in a way that makes the user very dangerous to target indeed.

name: Siege Pole
effect: Any actor hit by this weapon must make an agility save or be knocked prone. This weapon deals double damage against structures, including cover, buildings, and walls.
description: The Siege Pole (called the Siege Ram in development until a C&D was sent by IPS-N) is not a traditional ram; it fires a short, massive burst of raw kinetic energy, designed to crush and knockdown anything in its path.

name: Siege Launcher
effect: This weapon deals double damage to immobile targets, such as cover, buildings, walls, or actors that did not move in their last turn.
description: The second weapon system designed for the Leviathan, the Siege Launcher fires a solid lump of material designed to shatter on impact, inflicting grievous wounds to units and structures alike.

name: BI Dragonclaw
effect: This weapon may have up to two Mods installed.
description: The Bahamut Industries Dragonclaw melee weapon is, in many ways, the melee version of the Recoilless Rifle. It is simple, rugged, dependable, and easily customizable.

name: BI Recoilless Rifle
effect: This weapon may have up to two Mods installed.
description: The Bahamut Industries Recoilless Rifle is a simple design, rugged and dependable, able to work in any atmosphere or without, able to function after being buried in sand, mud, or snow for up to five years, and is micro-engraved with prayers of violence along the barrel. Due to its rugged design, it is quite capable of being modded to the user’s preference, above and beyond what many weapons could handle.

name: TAG System
effect: This weapon deals no damage and cannot deal damage (from talents or otherwise), but on hit, the target reduces the benefit of any cover it is receiving by one degree until the start of your next turn (hard to soft, soft to no) This effect can stack with itself and ends prematurely if the target is further than range 10 from you.
description: A collection of laser rangefingers, RADAR scanners, paracasual detection units and very finely tuned cameras as well as a secretive gamma ray-based targeting lense, the Tactical Augmentation GRASER system takes up additional space and power that many machines could use for weapons, but provides undeniable tactical advantage to allies.

name: Ricochet Rifle
effect: If you miss with your first attack roll, you may reroll this attack once. If the target is not in your Sensor range, this reroll is made with +1 Difficulty.
description: Taking advantage of the QUETZALCOATL’s advanced sensor packages, the Ricochet Rifle is capable of pre-calculating trajectories.

name: ‘Hoard’ Airburst Mortar
description: The ‘Hoard’ Mortar is an airburst design, specced to shatter mid-air and decimate an area with hypervelocity shards of a proprietary, swiftly-dissolving material.

name: ‘Tyrant’ Missile Launcher
description: An indirect multiple missile launcher system, each missile is loaded with a so-called holy explosive in a double-stage format for piercing enemy armor with it’s micromunitions, but the designs make it difficult to reload in the field.

name: ‘Tiamat’-Class Orbital Ion Device
effect: When you fire this weapon, you may choose to become Immobilized until the end of your next turn. If you do, this weapon gains the Seeking tag and the effective range increases to the size of the current map.
description: Few shells come with orbital artillery as standard; the extra material required for the support is excessive in many cases--mounting it on a mobile frame, the extra generators required to power it--and the necessity for orbital mirrors to direct the pulse outside of easy line of sight are all astoundingly expensive... But when it comes to smiting evil and bringing light to the darkness, Bahamut Industries spares no expense.
